name: Oracle of Forgotten Testament
description: Oracle of Forgotten Testament is an episodic turn-based RPG Touhou fangame. Player will use Touhou characters to venture Gensokyo and resolve incidents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: 1.5 GHz or better Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
